item.title: Udemycourseposts
item.description:
https://www.freelancer.com/projects/php/Udemy-Course-Posts-Website/details

www.udemykurs.com.tr MUST BE SIMILAR

I’m looking for a web developer to create an informational website for me. The main focus will be a blog section that I will regularly update with posts.

Key Features:

  • Blog section: This will be the primary content of the website. The developer should be able to set up a user-friendly interface for posting and managing blog content.
  • Commenting system: I want users to be able to comment on blog posts. The developer must ensure this feature is implemented effectively, with necessary spam protection and moderation tools.

Ideal Skills:
